title: Replace JSON export with copy-to-clipboard
description: Instead of generating a .json file, add a copy button (clipboard icon) that copies formatted annotations to clipboard. Include: filename, file path, location in document, the excerpt being commented on, and the comment itself. Structured markdown format ready to paste into Claude or other agents.

title: Collapsible and draggable sidebar
description: Sidebar should be collapsible (toggle to hide/show) and resizable via drag handle on the right edge.

title: Fix or remove document search
description: Search should work across all documents on the host computer (full-disk .md search) or be removed entirely. Current implementation is misleading if it only searches loaded docs.

title: Research Interpreter and Polylogue IA patterns
description: Study how Interpreter (macOS app) and polylogue.page (logged in on Dia browser: https://www.polylogue.page/w/samos-5qXyyo) handle information architecture, especially their integration with coding agents. Extract patterns for Margin's own agent integration story.
